snippet.title: Rare Revealed: Concept Showcase - Conker: Gettin' Medieval
snippet.description:
An overview of one of the Conker games that never made it, the time-straddling multiplayer epic Conker: Gettin' Medieval (with two 't's despite the logo). Complete with a showcase of never-before-seen concept artwork. You can find more videos chronicling unreleased Rare projects (not to mention the complete Making of Conker's Bad Fur Day) by picking up Rare Replay for Xbox One and delving into the suite of Rare Revealed bonus features!

Get Rare Replay for more: https://store.xbox.com/Xbox-One/Bundle/Rare-Replay/bc5c9721-2752-489e-851a-aa2aa039a23c
Talk to us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RareLtd
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RareLtd
